鏓鏓鏓

鏓字的基本解释

鏓
cōng
〔鎗鏓〕钟声。
大凿切入木中。

鏓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cōng］［zǒng］
［《廣韻》倉紅切，平東，清。］
［《集韻》蘇叢切，平東，心。］
［《集韻》損動切，上蕫，心。］
亦作“鍯1”。
(1)亦作“鍯”。用凿子凿。参见“鏓硐”。
(2)用同“鎗”。在器物上填嵌金银等饰物。参见“鏓衡”。

鏓字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏓； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1319第26
【唐韻】倉紅切，音悤。【說文】鎗鏓也。一曰大鑿平木者。　俗作鍯。

鏓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鏓字的起名意思

暂无。

鏓
Basic explanation of words
鏓
cōng
〔Gun 鏓〕The bell sounds.
The big chisel cuts into the wood.
鏓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cōng］［zǒng］
["Guangyun" Canghongqie, Pingdong, Qing. ]
["Jiyun" Su Congqie, Pingdong, Heart. ]
["Ji Yun" loss of moving cut, stirrup, heart. ]
Also known as "鍯1".
(1) Also known as "鍯". Chisel with a chisel. See "鏓硐".
(2) Use the same "gun". Fill the utensils with ornaments such as gold and silver. See "Cheng Heng".
鏓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鏓; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1319 Page 26
[Tang Yun] Canghong cut, sound swelling. [Said the text] Guns are also. One is the one who chiseled the wood.　The vulgar is made of a dragon.
鏓
